ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 5
ygData.msgSnippet: After spending two levels with a rogue companion, my cleric could all of a sudden (awfully) speak Thieves Cant. The rogue never once said a word to me in
ygData.messageBody:
After spending two levels with a rogue companion, my cleric could all of a
sudden (awfully) speak Thieves Cant. The rogue never once said a word to me
in anything other than common.

Dyrlia lvl 15 cleric
Shardesane lvl 4 enchanter


<<<Ok .. Hmm I'm Thinking because of the Different scenarios there can be
only one common thread . Exposure YES,
>but no to the creature, but the language???? Or Different creatures Use a
>Group of languages So there are ones In
>Odus That would activate Gnoll maybe kerrians ..??>>>
